## About
Minimalistic landing page with contact data and location map for local business point of sale.

## Features
- Responsive design
- Mobile first rendering
- Pure HTML and CSS
- No JavaScript
- No Frameworks
- Scalable inline SVG
- Iframe with OpenStreetMap
- Multilanguage
- Web Accessible
- SEO optimized
- Privacy friendly
- Ultra-fast loading

## Live Demo
You can view online demo [here](https://medzak.pl/).
